name: Air Coots' Adventure
description:
Ludwig Jam 2023 Entry

Run, jump, swing, and slide your way through this fast-paced third-person 3D platformer! Race against your times and collect coins to show off your skills. Are you feline up to the challenge?

If you want to check out some games we spent more than 10 days on, check out our Steam page! STEAM PAGE

Controls:

  • Settings - Tab
  • Move - WASD
  • Sprint - L Shift
  • Jump - Space
  • Slide/Crawl - RMB
  • Grapple - LMB
  • Respawn - R

Credits:

  • Art/Sound - Cohn
  • Programming - Rain

For the best experience we recommend downloading the standalone build!
